mapper.select: SELECT TOP 5 BOARD.*,NICKNAME, NVL(RECOMMEND, 0) as RECOMMEND FROM BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT POST_NUM, COUNT(*) AS RECOMMEND FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY POST_NUM ) RECOMMEND ON BOARD.POST_NUM = RECOMMEND.POST_NUM JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.USER_ID = MEMBER.USER_ID WHERE CATEGORY_NUM IN (1, 2) ORDER BY TIME DESC;

SELECT BOARD.*, NICKNAME, NVL(RECOMMEND, 0) as RECOMMEND FROM BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT POST_NUM, COUNT(*) AS RECOMMEND FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY POST_NUM ) RECOMMEND ON BOARD.POST_NUM = RECOMMEND.POST_NUM JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.USER_ID = MEMBER.USER_ID WHERE CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} ORDER BY TIME DESC;
